title: Elegant Kundan Polki Peacock Jhumka Earrings - Paramparik Shringar
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Hyderabadi Zardosi work detailing on the enamel.
features: Exquisitely handcrafted Jhumka earrings featuring a classic peacock motif. The ear stud showcases a floral design adorned with uncut Kundan Polki diamonds, surrounded by vibrant green emerald cabochons. The dome-shaped Jhumka is intricately decorated with ruby red enamel using Zardosi techniques, forming a textured pattern. Delicate chains of pearls and emerald beads dangle gracefully from the base, adding a touch of traditional charm. Finished with a light antique polish.
occasions: Ideal for traditional South Indian weddings (vivaham)
festive celebrations like Diwali and Sankranthi
and other special occasions. Can also be paired with modern outfits for a fusion look.
description: This stunning pair of Jhumka earrings blends the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry with contemporary design. The use of authentic Kundan Polki diamonds and vibrant enamel work showcases superior craftsmanship. The peacock motif symbolizes beauty, prosperity, and grace, making these earrings a treasured possession for generations. The classic design ensures versatility and timeless appeal. A true statement piece that exudes elegance and sophistication.
